professional field Additional Information The type of opportunity I am seeking probably would not exist in a company with less than 2000 employees I need to be in a role where both my AccountingFinance and Systems background are needed and has opportunity for growth I am very good at working with TypeA personalities in both Accounting and Systems because I know how to frame the hour round trip commute While I may consider temporary positions with a 2 hour commute I will not consider any positions with more than a 1 hour round trip commute Downtown Kansas City or the Northland is great but Overland Park KCK is not
